content: 4/7/25 2 19 pm everweb 3 4 preview what s new colourwork lace intarsia texture pdf patterns order home seaman s cap to fit head sizes small medium large 19-20 21-22 23-24 directions are for smallest size with larger sizes in brackets if there is only one figure it applies to all sizes finished measurements circumference 18 19 25 20 5 length with folded cuff 7 5 8 8 25 materials 1 skein any knitting worsted weight yarn 3 5oz/100gm approx = 220 yards/200 metres four 4mm double-pointed needles and four 4 5mm double-pointed needles or size to obtain gauge marker darning needle gauge 20 sts and 26 row = 4 /10 cm over stockinette st with 4 5mm needles terms dpn s - double-pointed needle s k - knit k2tog - knit 2 stitches together p - purl pm - place marker round s - round s st s - stitch es instructions with smaller needles cast on 90 96 102 sts distributing evenly over 3 needles pm and join round 1 *k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round repeat this round 19 more times next round k repeat round 1 7 more times change to larger needles and k until cap from beginning measures 7 5 crown round 1 *k13 14 15 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 84 90 96 sts round 2 and every even-numbered round k round 3 *k12 13 14 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 78 84 90 sts round 5 *k11 12 13 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 72 78 84 sts round 7 *k10 11 12 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 66 72 78 sts round 9 *k9 10 11 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 60 66 72 sts round 11 *k8 9 10 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 54 60 66 sts round 13 *k7 8 9 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 48 54 60 sts medium large round 15 *k7 8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 48 54 sts large round 17 *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 48 sts all sizes round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 42 sts round 2 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 36 sts round 3 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 30 sts round 4 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 24 sts round 5 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 18 sts round 6 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts round 7 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 6 sts cut yarn and draw through last 6 sts fasten_off fold up cuff copyright © 1999 brenda zuk this pattern is for personal use only and may not be reproduced for commercial purposes do not post this pattern to other internet
